articles.content: Monkeypox is also not the same as HIV or AIDS, as social media posts claim, and there is no evidence that vaccine-acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (VAIDS) is a real phenomenon https://t.co/L5Cd7CwX… [+561 chars]
